name: Stomp - Endless
description:
A game about stomping on people. What more could you want?

Stomp on people! They will randomly walk across the screen, and you have to click to create a boot and stomp on them. If you miss, and someone gets to the end, you lose a life. Yellow people have 1 health, orange have 2, and red have 3. After each round, your score will be converted into coins for you to spend in the shop. Try and get a highscore, and earn as much money as possible!
